title: "Promise Robotics Wants To ‘Close The Housing Gap’ By Using AI To Make Housing Accessible To All"
excerpt: "In an interview last week conducted over email, Promise Robotics co-founder and CEO Ramtin Attar explained the company helps the homebuilding industry address labor shortages, lower costs, and speed up construction by deploying automation at scale to the building of homes. This ranges from single-family dwellings to multi-story units."
